sentence: The PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF ( PKB ) is seeing unusually high volume in afternoon trading Friday, with over 819,000 shares traded versus three month average volume of about 174,000.
Shares of PKB were down about 0.8% on the day.

Components of that ETF with the highest volume on Friday were Home Depot ( HD ), trading down about 0.6% with over 1.8 million shares changing hands so far this session, and Quanta Services ( PWR ), up about 0.6% on volume of over 835,000 shares.
Trex ( TREX ) is lagging other components of the PowerShares Dynamic Building & Construction Portfolio ETF Friday, trading lower by about 2.2%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
